full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES MGON PO BZLOG BSGYUR BCOS THABS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PA'I MJUG TU BZLOG PA BYAS GNOD PA'I PHYOGS SU BTANG NAS MER BSREG ,MJUG GI SPYI LTAR BYA'O, ,'DI'I PHAN YON NI RIMS NAD PHYUGS LA GOD KHA MI KHA BABS BYAD KHA PHUR KHA RMI LAM NGAN PA, STAS NGAN PA, BKRA MI SHIS PA, NAD GDON BGEGS BAR CHOD MI MTHUN PA'I PHYOGS THAMS CAD ZHI BAR 'GYUR RO, ,ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SEHS KYI MGON PO BZLOG BSGYUR RGYUD LAS GSUNGS PA'I DER LHAN THABS BSNAN NAS BRIS PA NI, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BDAG DANG BDAG SKAL MNYAM RNAMS @007B SU PHAN PAR, NYIS STUNG LHAG CHAD BYUNG BA BLA MA MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS KYIS SPYAN SNGAR BSHAGS BZOD PAR ZHUS, GAL TE LEGS BSHAD CUNG ZAD YOD NA DE YIS BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD BYANG CHUB SNYING PO MA THOB KYI BAR DU BLA MA MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS KYIS 'BRAL MED GROGS MDZOD NAS 'GAL RKYEN BAR CHOD KUN SEL ZHING, MCHOG MTHUN DNGOS GRUB THOB PA'I GROGS MDZOD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,PHAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
